Posts.EditableText: I am currently making a text adventure in which the player is in a canteen. I need the player to click on **canteen** so that they can choose "look around" or "sit down" but the canteen is not showing as a clickable. Sorry for newbiness and thanks in advance.
Posts.HTML: I am currently making a text adventure in which the player is in a canteen. I need the player to click on canteen so that they can choose "look around" or "sit down" but the canteen is not showing as a clickable. Sorry for newbiness and thanks in advance.

Posts.EditableText:
You could add an object with the alias "canteen" inside of the real canteen, then add those verbs ("look around" and "sit down") to the object.  You'd have add a script to each verb to make things happen.

---
**An easier thing to do** is add this to the canteen's description:

```
You can {command:look:look around} or {command:sit:sit down}.
```

The first one will LOOK.   The second will SIT.
